articles.title: Starfield bug lets you loot a store through a puddle for infinite credits - TrueAchievements
articles.description: If you're low on credits in Starfield, a rather strange bug has been found that allows you to loot a store from a dirty puddle for infinite credits.
articles.content: While the bug may not help you directly unlock any of the Starfield achievements, it will undoubtedly make your playthrough much easier, especially if you're currently light on credits. Players have … [+1332 chars]
